title: Emerald Radiance Jhumka - Jadau Kundan Delight
materials: Seed Pearls. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: These stunning Jhumkas showcase the intricate artistry of Kundan setting. The rectangular top features a floral design adorned with Kundan stones, surrounded by vibrant green enamel. The bell-shaped Jhumka is embellished with Kundan stones and delicate seed pearls, culminating in a faceted emerald drop. The setting is meticulously crafted with an emphasis on the Jadau technique, reflecting traditional Telugu craftsmanship.
occasions: or any festive occasion. Can also be worn for traditional Telugu ceremonies like muhurtham
description: These Jhumkas are a testament to timeless elegance, blending traditional Kundan craftsmanship with a contemporary design sensibility. The high-quality gemstones and Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting beauty and durability. They are a perfect blend of heritage and modern style, making them a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
